column2: This character is a veteran of a Great War in the name of the Tsars.
This character is a veteran of a Great Patriotic War, having fought in the name of the Lord.
This character is a veteran of a Razumist Great Holy War.
This character is a veteran of a Chanson de Geste.
This character rode into war to fight the enemies of the Great Khan.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War to protect the ancient tales from all enemies.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War for the glory of Tir na nÓg.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War for the glory of the Trimurti regardless of sect.
This character has participated in a Dharmic Great Holy War.
This character has participated in a People's Liberation War and has carved out their own realm out of the lands of the enemies of the [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
This character is a veteran of a Winter War and has been made into a Knight of the Round Table.
This character has participated in a war in the name of Satanael to vanquish the servants of Yaldabaoth.
This character has fought in a Great Plunder to gain booty from enemies.
This character has participated in a Cycle's Calling, a holy war in the name of the great Thudnerbird.
This character has participated in a Great Moonfall, where in the name of the Moon, the enemies of the faith were punished.
This character has participated in a Sea War, fighting to preserve the supremacy of the three rulers of the sea.
This character has participated in a Grove Defense, fighting to preserve the holy groves of Sarna.
This character has fought in the name of Bu Luotuo to vanquish the influence of the heavenly emperors in their homeland.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War for the glory of the lords of water and flame.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War to protect the homes of their ancestral spirits.
This character has fought to bring Xihe's heavenly light to every corner of the world.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War against the malevolent forces of the Dragons of the East.
This character has followed Bali Penyalong's call to arms, as their prophet did all those years ago.
This character has valiantly fought in a Wuist Great Holy War, becoming immortalised in oral teachings ever since.
This character has fought in a Great Holy War, seeking justice for the death of Mae Khwan Khao.
